articles.title: 6 Killed In Shooting At A Fourth Of July Parade In A Chicago Suburb
articles.description: Six people were killed and at least 24 wounded after gunfire erupted at a Fourth of July parade in a Chicago suburb today, authorities said.
articles.content:
A video on social media shows parade participants suddenly fleeing in panic as gunfire erupted

articles.title: He Entered Mamata Banerjee's Home Thinking It Was This
articles.description: The man who sneaked past security guards and entered the premises of Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's residence in the city has told the police that he had done so thinking it was the Kolkata Police headquarters, a senior police official said.
articles.content:
Hafizul Mollah had first claimed to be a fruit seller and then a "good" vehicle driver.
